name: First Steps
description: Learn the basics of RPG gameplay.
Visit important locations and talk to NPCs.
This quest will guide you through your first adventure!

dialogs.start1: Welcome to SypixelRPG! I'll help you get started on your adventure.
dialogs.start2: First, you should visit the Hub area to get familiar with the world.
dialogs.start3: After that, find the Village Merchant to learn about trading. Good luck!
dialogs.player_accept: I'm ready to begin my adventure!
